creator: a.broekhuis@gmail.com
text:
Using apr_dso_load it isn't possible to specify flags (RTLD_LAZY, RTLD_LOCAL), while in certain cases this is needed/usable.

A possibility would be to add a a specific method for this usecase. Some of it apparantly has been discussed back in 2006 when doing a google search for apr_dso_open [1][2]. I couldn't find a bug entry for this, so added one.

[1] http://permalink.gmane.org/gmane.comp.apache.apr.devel/9295
[2] http://www.mail-archive.com/dev@apr.apache.org/msg15182.html
